desc: Silkweb is your established silk bedding store. For all your silk duvet, silk sheets and silk pillows needs. Naturally hypoallergenic, soft, warm, lightweight silk duvets with silk's special quality of temperature control.

layout.text: Silk duvet, silk sheets, silk pillows and more..
Our silk duvets are fully hypoallergenic, filled with the best quality Mulberry silk and uniquely cased in luxurious silk charmeuse. Simply the best ?
